notes.heading: Functions and Models
notes.summary: Various representations of functions introduced: verbal, numerical, visual, and algebraic.

notes.heading: Limits and Derivatives
notes.summary: Limits are introduced through tangent and velocity problems, covering multiple viewpoints.

notes.heading: Differentiation Rules
notes.summary: Covers basic differentiation rules for polynomial, exponential, and trigonometric functions.

notes.heading: Applications of Differentiation
notes.summary: Includes extreme values, Mean Value Theorem, and optimization problems.

notes.heading: The Definite Integral
notes.summary: Introduces the concept of the definite integral and the Fundamental Theorem of Calculus.

notes.heading: Techniques of Integration
notes.summary: Discusses various techniques for integration including substitution and integration by parts.

notes.heading: Infinite Sequences and Series
notes.summary: Introduces sequences, series, and convergence tests such as the Ratio and Root Tests.

notes.heading: Parametric Equations and Polar Coordinates
notes.summary: Covers functions defined by parametric equations and applications in calculus.

notes.heading: Vector Functions
notes.summary: Explores vector functions and their derivatives in three-dimensional space.

notes.heading: Partial Derivatives
notes.summary: Introduces functions of multiple variables and techniques for finding partial derivatives.
